text: Philippe de Broca (; 15 March 1933 â€“ 26 November 2004) was a French movie director. His best known movies were That Man from Rio (L'Homme de Rio), The Man from Acapulco (Le Magnifique) and On Guard (Le Bossu). Broce died of cancer at a Neuilly-sur-Seine hospital on 26 November 2004 at the age of 71.French film director Philippe de Broca dies ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Philippe de Broca Interview, 1998 Category:1933 births Category:2004 deaths Category:Movie directors from Paris Category:Cancer deaths in France
